author: Staff Reporter
text:
A range of health and fitness products and services are on offer at the exhibition —Photo: G. Krishnaswamy

The Hindu Health, Fitness and Lifestyle Expo 2015 began at the Chennai Trade Centre, Nandampakkam on Saturday.

A range of health and fitness products and services are on offer.

Most visitors were curious and had a lot of questions for the experts manning the stalls.

The expo will be open from 10.30 a.m. to 8 p.m. on Sunday.

Creating awareness

V. Bhaskara Reddy, vice-president, corporate relations, Global Health City Hospitals, said, “By participating in the event, we envisage creating awareness among public about available health care solutions and preventive medicines.”

The stalls with health insurance and general insurance products and other prioritised health care solutions and products were a big draw.

The Presenting Sponsor for the expo is Global Health City. Catch E and Tamil Nadu Salt Corporation Limited are Associate Sponsors.

The Health Insurance partner for the event is Royal Sundaram General Insurance Company.

The General Insurance Partner for the event is United India Insurance Company Limited.

Performax is the sportswear partner of the event, which concludes today.
title: Insurance products draw visitors to health expo
